EmailTemplate.subject: See you next Thursday 3/12 at the Pivotal Cloud Platform Workshop
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Pivotal Cloud Platform Workshop coming up next Thursday in Columbus. We look forward to seeing you!
Please also bring your laptop and power cord to fully participate in this hands-on workshop. A Mac or Linux environment is ideal. For the best workshop experience, please prep your laptop prior to attending following the “Workshop Prerequisites” listed below.
Pivotal Cloud Platform Workshop Thursday, March 12, 2015 8:00am - 4:00pm (breakfast & lunch provided) Workshop Agenda <https://pivotal.io/platform-as-a-service/cloud-platform-roadshow/columbus>
Renaissance Columbus Downtown Hotel Executive Meeting Room 50 North Third Street Columbus, Ohio 43215 Map and Driving Directions <http://www.marriott.com/hotels/maps/travel/cmhbr-renaissance-columbus-downtown-hotel/>
Parking Information Valet Parking available for $25 per day
WORKSHOP PREREQUISITES All Hands-on Sections
- Git <http://git-scm.com/downloads> ("brew install git") - A GitHub <https://github.com> account - Your favorite Java editor (Eclipse, IntelliJ IDEA, Netbeans) - The Cloud Foundry CLI <https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cli/releases> - download the latest!
- A FREE account on Pivotal Web Services - create a 60-day trial with no credit card at https://run.pivotal.io
QUESTIONS? Contact Paul Santos at psantos@pivotal.io <mailto:psantos@pivotal.io> or via cell at 408-425-9302 <tel:(631) 388-0569>.
We look forward to seeing you! The Pivotal Team
P.S.- Only a few spots remain! If you have a colleague interested in attending please forward on this link to the workshop details & registration <http://pivotal.io/platform-as-a-service/cloud-platform-roadshow/columbus>.
